record.name: Ear Lobe Cuff Earrings
record.description: Handcrafted in 14-karat solid gold, the Ear Lobe Cuff Earrings are sleek, edgy, and straightforward in design.

record.name: Heart Locket Necklace
record.description: Beautifully handcrafted in 14-karat solid gold, this charming heart-shaped locket is a sweet addition to your chains.

record.name: Bubble Barely There Bracelet
record.description: This 14-karat yellow gold Barely There link bracelet is a classic minimal chain for the perfect understated look.

record.name: Bold Round Diamond Link Ring
record.description: 14-karat gold Bold Round Diamond Link Ring with striking chunky chain design encrusted with pavé round cut natural diamonds.

record.name: Classic Cross Pendant
record.description: This classic staple is the perfect piece to add detail to your outfit. The sharp design lends an eye-catching interest to a sentimental pendant.

record.name: Cushion Signet Ring with Black Onyx
record.description: Embody a modern masculinity with this bold cushion signet ring. The focal point of the ring is the handsomely polished onyx stone which sits at the center of its high-polished finish band.

record.name: Dua Asymmetric Anklet
record.description: An upgrade to your sneaker and sandal game — add a little sparkle to your ankle with this stunning 14-karat yellow gold asymmetric anklet with half round and half elongated links.

record.name: Bar Bracelet
record.description: Contemporary and timeless, this smooth and polished bar on a dainty bracelet chain is crafted with 14-karat solid gold and offers a lifetime of daily wear.

record.name: Ultra Fine Technicolor Ring
record.description: Playful yet refined, the Ultra Fine Technicolor Ring is crafted in 14-karat solid gold set with an assortment of colored semi-precious stones that add a delicate dose of rainbow sparkle.

record.name: Claw Pearl Studs
record.description: Perfect for everyday wear, you can never go wrong with these 100% natural freshwater timeless beauties in three prong 14-karat solid gold setting.
